channel.title: Quran Podcast
channel.description: A podcast that recites the Quran with beautiful recitations by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy.

item.title: Surah Al-Fatiha (The Opening) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha with 7 verses. The opening chapter of the Quran, essential for daily prayers, asking for guidance and mercy from Allah.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Fatiha - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha, the first chapter of the Quran, emphasizing guidance and mercy from Allah.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Baqarah with 286 verses. The longest Surah in the Quran, covering guidance for personal development, laws, and guidance for society.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Baqarah - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Baqarah, the longest Surah in the Quran, providing guidance for personal and societal development.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Aali Imran (The Family of Imran) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Aali Imran with 200 verses. A Surah discussing the family of Imran and lessons from the lives of the prophets.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Aali Imran - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Aali Imran, which focuses on the family of Imran and the lessons learned from their lives and the prophets.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah An-Nisa (The Women) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah An-Nisa with 176 verses. A Surah that provides guidance on family laws, inheritance, and societal welfare, with emphasis on justice and fairness for women.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah An-Nisa - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah An-Nisa, which emphasizes justice and the protection of rights for women and society.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Ma'idah (The Table Spread) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Ma'idah with 120 verses. This Surah addresses various matters of religious law, including dietary laws, justice, and piety.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Ma'idah - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Ma'idah, which focuses on various aspects of religious law, including dietary restrictions and justice.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-An'am (The Cattle) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-An'am with 165 verses. A Surah discussing the oneness of Allah and the guidance given to previous nations and prophets.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-An'am - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-An'am, focusing on the oneness of Allah, the guidance to earlier nations, and the stories of the prophets.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Ya-Sin (The Heart of the Quran) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Ya-Sin (The Heart of the Quran) with 83 verses. A Surah that provides comfort and solace for the believers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Ya-Sin - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Ya-Sin (The Heart of the Quran), known for its great significance in providing comfort and blessings.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Mulk (The Sovereignty) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Mulk (The Sovereignty) with 30 verses. A Surah that emphasizes Allah's control over everything in the universe.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Mulk - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Mulk (The Sovereignty), a Surah that underscores Allah's control over everything in the universe.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Kahf (The Cave) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Kahf (The Cave) with 110 verses. It includes stories of the people of the cave and other lessons for believers.

item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Kahf - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Kahf (The Cave), which narrates stories of the people of the cave and offers guidance to believers.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Mu’minun (The Believers), which describes the attributes of the true believers.

item.title: Surah Hud (Prophet Hud) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Hud with 123 verses. A Surah that contains stories of past prophets and the lessons derived from them.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Ibrahim, which discusses the story of Prophet Ibrahim and his supplications to Allah.

item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Hijr - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Hijr, which discusses the destruction of previous nations and the greatness of Allah's creation.

item.title: Surah An-Nahl (The Bee) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah An-Nahl with 128 verses. A Surah that speaks about the signs of Allah in creation and the benefits provided to mankind.

item.itunes:subtitle: Surah An-Nahl - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah An-Nahl, which mentions the benefits of Allah's creation, such as honeybees and the guidance for mankind.

item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Isra with 111 verses. A Surah that highlights the Night Journey of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and mentions several aspects of faith.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Isra, which speaks about the miraculous Night Journey and several aspects of faith.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Mu'minun, which highlights the characteristics of the believers and the reward for their faith.

item.title: Surah Al-Furqan (The Criterion) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Furqan with 77 verses. A Surah that discusses the difference between truth and falsehood, and the qualities of Allah's righteous servants.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Furqan, which clarifies the distinction between right and wrong and describes the traits of Allah's righteous servants.

item.title: Surah An-Naml (The Ant) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah An-Naml with 55 verses. A Surah that mentions the story of Prophet Solomon and the Queen of Sheba, and the miracles of Allah.

item.itunes:subtitle: Surah An-Naml - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah An-Naml, which narrates the story of Prophet Solomon and the Queen of Sheba, and shows the miracles of Allah.

item.title: Surah Al-Ahzab (The Confederates) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Ahzab with 73 verses. A Surah that discusses the Battle of the Trench and the events surrounding it.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Ya-Sin, a Surah that highlights the importance of belief in Allah and the revelation of the Quran.

item.title: Surah As-Saffat (Those Who Set the Ranks) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah As-Saffat with 182 verses. A Surah that discusses the angels and their roles, and the consequences of disbelieving.

item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah As-Saffat, which covers the roles of the angels and the consequences of disbelief.

item.title: Surah Az-Zumar (The Groups) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Az-Zumar with 75 verses. A Surah that emphasizes the importance of worshiping Allah alone and the consequences of disbelief.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Az-Zumar - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Az-Zumar, which highlights the importance of worshiping Allah alone and the dangers of associating partners with Him.

item.title: Surah Fussilat (Explained in Detail) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Fussilat with 54 verses. A Surah that explains the signs of Allah and emphasizes the importance of belief and submission.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Fussilat - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Fussilat, which elaborates on the signs of Allah and stresses the importance of faith and submission to His will.
